title: ICE on generators + arrays

labels.name: I-ICE

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly

body:
Sorry for the vague title.

```rust
async fn test() {
    const C: usize = 4;
    foo(&mut [0u8; C]).await;
}

async fn foo(bs: &mut [u8]) {}
```

([Playground](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=6d14ed2879a33ba08fb623cb30b9adff))

<hr>

Note that this does not result in an ICE:
```rust
async fn test() {
    foo(&mut [0u8; 4]).await;
}

async fn foo(bs: &mut [u8]) {}
```
Also works with shared references.
